Assignment 2

Google Trends Data

```{r}
## EPPS 6302 Methods of Data Collection and Production
## Google Trends with R

install.packages("gtrendsR")
library(gtrendsR)

# First query
TrumpHarrisElection <- gtrends(c("Trump", "Harris", "election"),
                               onlyInterest = TRUE,
                               geo = "US",
                               gprop = "web",
                               time = "today 12-m")  # Shorter time range
Sys.sleep(10)

the_df <- TrumpHarrisElection$interest_over_time
plot(TrumpHarrisElection)

# Second query
tg <- gtrends("tariff", time = "today 12-m")
Sys.sleep(10)

# Third query
plot(gtrends("tariff", time = "today 12-m"))
Sys.sleep(10)

# Fourth query
plot(gtrends("tariff", geo = "GB", time = "today 12-m"))
Sys.sleep(10)

# Fifth query
plot(gtrends("tariff", geo = c("US", "GB", "TW"), time = "today 12-m"))
Sys.sleep(10)

# Sixth query
tg_iot <- tg$interest_over_time
tct <- gtrends(c("tariff", "China military", "Taiwan"), time = "today 12-m")
Sys.sleep(10)

tct <- data.frame(tct$interest_over_time)
plot(gtrends(c("tariff", "China military", "Taiwan"), time = "today 12-m"))
```
